description: Everton news: Watch - David Moyes 'jealous' in transfer window
title: Watch - David Moyes 'jealous' in transfer window - BBC Sport
title_page: Everton news: Watch - David Moyes 'jealous' in transfer window - BBC Sport
maintext: With just a few more days before the transfer window closes, Everton boss David Moyes has been speaking to the media about what business the club can do and the impact of profit and sustainability rules.
